channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Noto Sondaggi for Rai 3, 9 April 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Movimento 5 Stelle (EFDD): 17.6–22.6%
  • Partito Democratico (S&D): 18.6–23.6%
  • Lega Nord (EAPN): 29.7–35.5%
  • Forza Italia (EPP): 7.8–11.5%
  • Fratelli d’Italia (ECR): 4.3–7.1%
  • Liberi e Uguali (S&D): 0.9–2.5%
  • Più Europa (ALDE): 2.1–4.3%
  • Noi con l’Italia (ECR): 0.2–1.2%
  • Potere al Popolo (GUE/NGL): 0.5–1.8%
